macro.name: PORT
macro.description: Serial COM Port

macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: port baud rate (default: 9600)

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: port data bits (default: 7)

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: port parity (default: space)

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: port stop bits (default: 1)

macro.name: ADR1
macro.description: Address to use for 1st PSU in the chain; 3 digits required, prepend zeroes if required

macro.name: ID1
macro.description: ID to use for the 1st PSU; Min 1 character, Max 4 characters; defaults to the specified address

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_I1
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to current of the 1st PSU; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_V1
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to voltage of the 1st PSU; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_WRITE_I1
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting current to set value of the 1st PSU; defaults to 1000

macro.name: ADR2
macro.description: Address to use for 2nd PSU in the chain; 3 digits required, prepend zeroes if required

macro.name: ID2
macro.description: ID to use for the 2nd PSU; Min 1 character, Max 4 characters; defaults to the specified address

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_I2
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to current of the 2nd PSU; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_V2
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to voltage of the 2nd PSU; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_WRITE_I2
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting current to set value of the 2nd PSU; defaults to 1000

macro.name: ID3

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_I3
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to current of the 3rd PSU; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_V3
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to voltage of the 3rd PSU; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_WRITE_I3
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting current to set value of the 3rd PSU; defaults to 1000

macro.name: FACTOR_WRITE_I4
